description: This file contains CSS styles and variables for theming a Tic Tac Toe application frontend.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles for the main application container, setting background and text colors, and handling responsiveness.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the application header, including background color, layout, and font size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
